name: HeroLogoBillboard
description: Hero section with large text logo at top that scales to fill container width, description text, and single framed media (card or browser style) below.

description.example: we help driven founders build the brands of tomorrow through websites, product design & branding.

imageSrc.note: Supports external URLs with unoptimized prop

videoSrc.note: Takes precedence over imageSrc if both provided

imageAlt.note: Empty string marks image as decorative (aria-hidden)

frameStyle.note: 'card' displays media in simple card with padding. 'browser' wraps media in browser mockup with address bar and window controls.

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="text-stagger" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="pill" cardStyle="layered-gradient">
  <HeroLogoBillboard 
    logoText="klime studio" 
    description="we help driven founders build the brands of tomorrow through websites, product design & branding." 
    imageSrc="/hero.jpg"
    imageAlt="Hero showcase"
    frameStyle="card"
  />
</ThemeProvider>
